o p e n space p a r e n t h e s e s space 3 space s q u a r e d space c l o s e space p a r e n t h e s e s space s q u a r e d space s p a c e space x space s p a c e space s p a c e space o p e n space p a r e n t h e s e s space i t a l i c space 3 space t o space t h e space p o w e r space o f space i t a l i c space 4 space c l o s e space p a r e n t h e s e s space s q u a r e d
